item.description:
Publisher's description:

The annual Friar's Almanac Compendium which includes a selection of the greatest articles.
This month subscribers have a way of reliving the best of Friar's Almanac.
Articles Include:

News from the capitol
 All Hell Breaks Loose
 Evil Unleashed On Ministry
 Redphage Poisons the Capitol
 Prime Minister Taken by Fiend
 Princess Found Alive in Ministry
 Royal Proclamation
 A Yellow Dingo Ate My Baby
 The Space Goblins Threaten to Flush James M. Ward Oout an Airlock
 Director Timo Vuorensola blabs under torture that he knows the whereabouts of Nazi UFOs
 I Think James Jacobs was Looking Forward to Being Waylaid by my Goblin Minions.
 My Goblins Abduct Fantasy Artist Clyde Caldwell for some Q&A Time.
 On Foreign Fields
 Finding Gamers
 Gaming
 Investing In An RPG
 Random Maps
 Quarry Workers Huts
 Guild Counting House
 Brams Keep
 The Rookery
 The Bandit Caves
 Chapel Of the Demon Summoner
 In Lands Where Chaos Reigns
 Campaign Event Handling
 Whedon At Work
 The Dr Horrible Sing-Along Blog
 Empire Today
 Getting Your Adventure Ideas From the News
 Going Steampunk Bad
 Twenty Adventure ideas
 Goblin Poetry Inventational
 Fae On the Bridge
 Goblins
 Red Riding Hood
 Short Fiction
 Uberspace
 Square Coins
 Lost To the Aether
 The Teloren Duchy Murders

 How To Convert the StarWars Saga Into a D&D Campaign Setting
 Agricultural Economy
 Haunted Space Ships
 Economics in a D&D Perspective
 Albrekt's Guide to Gate Travel
 Deeper Into the Map
 The Golden Age of SciFi RPG
 Urban Environments
 Exploring Sewers and Cysterns
 Alone In the Pillory When the Rotten Tomatoes Fly
 The Camera Obscura
 Retasking the Magic

 Going With the Crowd
